Package com.goldasil.pjv.dto

Class MoveDTO

java.lang.Object
com.goldasil.pjv.models.Move
com.goldasil.pjv.dto.MoveDTO
public class MoveDTO
extends Move
A helper class encompassing all the necessary data for communicating the performed moves between the players, can be used to both send through the network in the JSON format, or passed as an object directly to another player. Carries the last performed move, consequences of the move for the next player and a list of active states in the game that are to be taken into account. Includes functions for analysis of the information about the move.
